snippet: Jo-Wilfried Tsonga followed a week of big upsets in Toronto with an early exit in Cincinnati, losing his opening match at the Western & Southern Open to Mikhail Youzhny, 6-1, 6-4.
abstract: Jo-Wilfried Tsonga loses his opening match to Mikhail Youzhny, and Venus Williams loses to Lucie Safarova, at Western and Southern Open; other tennis news noted.
lead_paragraph: Jo-Wilfried Tsonga followed a week of big upsets in Toronto with an early exit in Cincinnati, losing his opening match at the Western & Southern Open to Mikhail Youzhny, 6-1, 6-4.
